full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## Solicitation Number: 5P420-23-0299/A
### Issued on: February 12, 2024

The Parks Canada Agency invites proposals for the supply and delivery of Electric Vehicle Supply Equipment (EVSE) in accordance with the terms and conditions outlined in this solicitation.

### Tender Description:
The agency requires 22 "GROUP 2 LEVEL 1 AND LEVEL 2 NON-NETWORKED EVSE" for delivery to various locations in British Columbia and Yukon. This procurement is subject to the Inuvialuit Final Agreement, Ta'an Kwach'an Council, and Kwanlin Dun First Nation.

### Pre-Qualification:
Only suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Standing Offer (RFSA) E60HS-21EVSE/B are eligible to participate in this solicitation. Suppliers interested in becoming pre-qualified under this RFSA should refer to the following URL: <https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice/pw-hn-373-80467>

### Tender Conditions:
The requested delivery date for the goods is March 28, 2024. This notice is published on CanadaBuys for a period of 15 calendar days.

### Bidding Process:
Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful. Debriefings may be provided in writing, by telephone, or in person.

### Important Details:

* **Solicitation Number:** 5P420-23-0299/A
* **Contracting Entity:** Parks Canada Agency
* **Contact Information:**
	+ Terry Imm, Contracting Authority
	+ Email: <terry.imm@pc.gc.ca>
	+ Phone: (250) 837-1659
	+ Fax: (866) 246-6893
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 27, 2024, at 16:00:00 (Mountain Standard Time)

Please note that this tender is now expired. The above information is presented for historical purposes only. 

---

However, if you are interested in participating in a similar tender in the future, please check the [CanadaBuys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities/tender-notice) for available opportunities.
